LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.0.label: Alpha TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had an outstanding reaction to being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has phenomenal abilities compared to normal humans. Like all TAGS, {PAWN_nameDef} is more prone to mental breaks.
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.1.label: Beta TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.1.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had a superior outcome to being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has outstanding abilities compared to normal humans. Sadly like all TAGS, {PAWN_nameDef} is more prone to mental breaks.
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.2.label: Gamma TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.2.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had an average reaction to being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has exceptional abilities compared to normal humans. As with all TAGS, {PAWN_nameDef} is more prone to mental breaks.
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.3.label: Delta TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.3.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had a sub par reaction to being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has above average abilities compared to normal humans. Like all TAGS, {PAWN_nameDef} is more prone to mental breaks.
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.4.label: Nuero TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.4.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had a two sided outcome from being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has both crippling mental issues and outstanding abilities.
